00090     void ExtendedFasta::appendFromStream(istream & input,
00091         bpp::VectorSequenceContainer & vsc) const throw (bpp::Exception)
00092       {
00093         if (!input)
00094           {
00095             throw bpp::IOException ("Fasta::read: fail to open file");
00096           }
00097 
00098         string temp, name, sequence = ""; // Initialization
00099 
00100         // Main loop : for all file lines
00101         while (!input.eof())
00102           {
00103             getline(input, temp, '\n'); // Copy current line in temporary string
00104 
00105             // If first character is >
00106             if (temp[0] == '>')
00107               {
00108                 // If a name and a sequence were founded
00109                 if ((name != "") && (sequence != ""))
00110                   {
00111                     // New sequence creation, and addition in existing VectorSequenceContainer
00112                     bpp::Sequence * seq = new bpp::Sequence(name, sequence, vsc.getAlphabet());
00113                     vsc.addSequence(*seq);
00114                     delete seq;
00115                     //name = ""; no need for that, no?
00116                     sequence = "";
00117                   }
00118                 // Sequence name isolation
00119                 name = temp;
00120                 name.erase(name.begin()); // Character > deletion
00121               }
00122             else
00123               sequence += temp; // Sequence isolation
00124           }
00125 
00126         // Addition of the last sequence in file
00127         if ((name != "") && (sequence != ""))
00128           {
00129             bpp::Sequence * seq = new bpp::Sequence(name, sequence, vsc.getAlphabet());
00130             vsc.addSequence(*seq);
00131             delete seq;
00132           }
00133       }
00134   }
